Declare @vchSQL nvarchar(max) Declare @bigsql nvarchar(max)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] /****** Object: StoredProcedure [dbo].[usp_UpdateCriteriasIsFunctionEnabled] Script Date: 07/03/2012 13:06:16 ******/ IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[usp_UpdateCriteriasIsFunctionEnabled]'') AND type in (N''P'', N''PC'')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_UpdateCriteriasIsFunctionEnabled] ' exec (@vchSQL)
set @vchSQL =' Create PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_UpdateCriteriasIsFunctionEnabled] @DimPoolId bigint, @IsEnabled bit = 1, @PoolFunctionName varchar(200)
AS Begin SET NOCOUNT ON
If @IsEnabled is NULL and @PoolFunctionName is NULL begin Raiserror(''''The function name and the flag are null'''', 16, 1) end
If @IsEnabled is NULL and @PoolFunctionName is not NULL update tblDimEC set IsFunctionEnabled = dbo.fn_IsCriteriaIncludedIntoPoolFunction(@PoolFunctionName, CriteriaSetId, CriteriaName) where DimPoolId = @DimPoolId
If @IsEnabled is not NULL and @PoolFunctionName is NULL update tblDimEC set IsFunctionEnabled = @IsEnabled where DimPoolId = @DimPoolId
end '
SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; EXEC (@BigSQL)
